events.message: I received my new laptop yesterday but the screen has several scratches and some dead pixels, making it hard to use.
The reported problem was identified as a product defect related to damaged screen issues upon delivery.
A support agent has been assigned to handle the case regarding the laptop screen defects you reported.
Hello, thank you for reaching out about the issue with your laptop screen. I'm here to help you resolve this.
Could you please send us photos showing the scratches and dead pixels on the screen so we can assess the damage properly?
I have attached clear pictures of the scratches and dead pixels on the laptop screen. The damage is quite visible and disappointing.
We apologize for the inconvenience. We can arrange a replacement unit to be sent to you immediately and provide a prepaid label to return the faulty laptop.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the offer for replacement and will follow the return instructions once I receive the label.
The replacement laptop has been shipped and your return label was emailed to you. Please let us know once you send the faulty unit back.
We wanted to check if you have received the replacement laptop and if the new device is functioning without any issues.
Yes, I received the replacement and it works perfectly. Thanks for the excellent assistance.
We are glad your issue was resolved to your satisfaction. We are closing this case now, thank you for your patience.
